<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/organization-units/tree/{path}"}

Delete an organization unit by hierarchical handle path

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple","explode":false,"description":"Hierarchical path of organization unit handles separated by forward slashes.\nExamples:\n- `engineering` - Deletes the root OU with handle \"engineering\"\n- `engineering/frontend` - Deletes the \"frontend\" OU under \"engineering\"\n- `engineering/frontend/ui` - Deletes the \"ui\" OU under \"engineering/frontend\"\n","example":"engineering/frontend"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Organization unit deleted"},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["code","message"],"properties":{"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Error"},"examples":{"has-children":{"summary":"Organization unit has children","value":{"code":"OU-1006","message":"Organization unit has sub resources","description":"Cannot delete organization unit with children or users or groups"}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Organization unit not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["code","message"],"properties":{"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Error"},"examples":{"path-not-found":{"summary":"Handle path not found","value":{"code":"OU-1003","message":"Organization unit not found","description":"The organization unit with the specified handle path does not exist"}},"invalid-path":{"summary":"Invalid path structure","value":{"code":"OU-1008","message":"Invalid handle path","description":"The handle path does not represent a valid organizational hierarchy"}}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
